version_description: • Fixes an issue with tracks sometimes being scrobbled twice
• Fixes an issue with tracks sometimes being scrobbled twice

• If there's only one album for the selected artist, directly pushes to the album instead a list containing the album.
• Left-Handed mode is now available for the player view.
• Fixes "NO_VOLUME_AVAILABLE" on player when your device is plugged to an output audio device.

• If there's only one album for the selected artist, directly pushes to the album instead a list containing the album.
• Left-Handed mode is now available for the player view.
• Fixes "NO_VOLUME_AVAILABLE" on player when your device is plugged to an output audio device.

• iPhone 6 and 6 Plus support
• List mode can be activated instead of the default grid display mode (Settings > Ecoute > Appearance)
• UI enhancements
• Numeric-list on the right when browsing tracks from a playlist
• Playlists URL scheme support (like ecoute://play?playlists=my%20playlist)
• URL schemes are globally improved and now support Arrays of arguments. (like ecoute://play?playlists=Compilations,Purchased - OR - like ecoute://play?terms=Coldplay%20Magic,Daft%20Punk%20Random%20Access)
• Improved playlists display
• Dynamic fonts support

• Fixes a missing artwork issue with playlists containing only one album
• Fixes a crash when trying to share on Facebook or Twitter

• iPhone 6 and 6 Plus support
• List mode can be activated instead of the default grid display mode (Settings > Ecoute > Appearance)
• UI enhancements
• Numeric-list on the right when browsing tracks from a playlist
• Playlists URL scheme support (like ecoute://play?playlists=my%20playlist)
• URL schemes are globally improved and now support Arrays of arguments. (like ecoute://play?playlists=Compilations,Purchased - OR - like ecoute://play?terms=Coldplay%20Magic,Daft%20Punk%20Random%20Access)
• Improved playlists display
• Dynamic fonts support

• Fixes a missing artwork issue with playlists containing only one album
• Fixes a crash when trying to share on Facebook or Twitter

• Fixes some UI glitches
• Fixes a crash when browsing playlists in list-view mode
